title: Master Crafter

SMW Subobject for EldestNPC location: Crafting GuildUses infobox: NPCNPC ID: 5810Examine: He is in charge of the Crafting Guild.Release date: 27 February 2002Image: File:Master Crafter (eldest).pngIs members only: falseIs variant of: Master Crafter

The Master Crafter is one of the non-player characters who can be found south-west of Falador inside the Crafting Guild. He teaches many advanced crafters how to use the facilities within the guild, such as the mines, the potter's wheels, and the pottery ovens.

The eldest Master Crafter is the master of Crafting, and wears the Crafting cape. This crafter sells the Crafting cape to members with level 99 in Crafting for 99,000 coins.

Alongside him in the guild are a couple of other Master Crafters who do not wear the Crafting cape, yet they are believed to work for the one with the Crafting cape. The youngest Master Crafter tends to be rude to players when he is talked to.

Contents

  • 2 Dialogue
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)

Stock[edit | edit source]

Note: If a player has multiple 99s, they will receive the trimmed variant of the cape instead.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
26 September 2005
(update)
  • The NPC was renamed from " Master crafter"[sic] to "Master Crafter".
  • The NPC's examine was changed from "The man in charge of the crafter's guild." to "He's in charge of the Crafting Guild."

Alongside him in the guild are a couple of other Master Crafters who do not wear the Crafting cape, yet they are believed to work for the one with the Crafting cape.
